segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, seemingly lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is drying a plate, completely unaware that water is overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how absorbed she is, despite the chaos lurking at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder why she hasnâ€™t noticed the wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Maybe it's just one of those days where she has too much on her mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of concern as I think about what could happen if she slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Is she too caught up in her domestic tasks to see the bigger picture?
segments.speaker: PAR
